context: Motorola Solutions, Inc. is a communications and analytics company focused on land mobile radio, public safety, and command center software. RAZR success. Mobile division profitable briefly.

competitors.name: Nokia
competitors.notes: Launched N-Series and E-Series phones, N70 popular model

competitors.name: Samsung
competitors.notes: D500 slider phone challenged RAZR, growing market share

competitors.name: Sony Ericsson
competitors.notes: K750 Cybershot and W800 Walkman phones broke new ground
